body: Ouestafnews writes  (fr) that : " A factory capable of producing 2000 cars a year will soon be inaugurated near Bamako. The first Hyundai cars  «made in Mali» are expected for June 2011."
original_body: Ouestafnews writes (fr) that : " A factory capable of producing 2000 cars a year will soon be inaugurated near Bamako. The first Hyundai cars  «made in Mali» are expected for June 2011."
title: Mali: Cars « Made in Mali » to Be Sold on the West African Market

sentence: Ouestafnews writes  (fr) that : " A factory capable of producing 2000 cars a year will soon be inaugurated near Bamako.
The first Hyundai cars  «made in Mali» are expected for June 2011."
